statements: SELECT * FROM SwimmingLessons;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_date, start_time FROM SwimmingLessons WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_name, end_time FROM SwimmingLessons WHERE lesson_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT lesson_name, instructor_id, student_id FROM SwimmingLessons WHERE start_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM SwimmingLessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM SwimmingLessons WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_date FROM SwimmingLessons WHERE lesson_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_name, start_time, end_time FROM SwimmingLessons WHERE instructor_id = 2 AND start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(lesson_id) AS lesson_count FROM SwimmingLessons GROUP BY student_id HAVING lesson_count > 3;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_name, lesson_date, start_time, end_time, instructor_id, student_id FROM SwimmingLessons WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY lesson_date ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM swimming_lesson_schedule ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, lesson_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lesson_location, lesson_date FROM swimming_lesson_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_lessons FROM swimming_lesson_schedule;
SELECT instructor_name, available_date, available_time, instructor_specialty FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY available_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT lesson_location, lesson_time, instructor_name FROM swimming_lesson_schedule INNER JOIN instructor_availability ON swimming_lesson_schedule.instructor_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id ORDER BY lesson_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM swimming_lesson_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, lesson_time ASC;

SELECT lesson_location, instructor_name, available_date FROM swimming_lesson_schedule INNER JOIN instructor_availability ON swimming_lesson_schedule.instructor_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id WHERE instructor_specialty = 'Advanced';

SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, available_time FROM swimming_lesson_schedule INNER JOIN instructor_availability ON swimming_lesson_schedule.instructor_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' AND instructor_specialty = 'Beginner' ORDER BY lesson_date ASC;

SELECT lesson_location, instructor_name, instructor_specialty FROM swimming_lesson_schedule INNER JOIN instructor_availability ON swimming_lesson_schedule.instructor_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id WHERE lesson_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, instructor_specialty FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY available_date DESC, available_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM lesson_schedules ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT lesson_date, lesson_time FROM lesson_schedules WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_date, lesson_time, student_id FROM lesson_schedules WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT instructor_name, availability_date, start_time, end_time FROM instructor_availability WHERE availability_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, lesson_id, progress_status FROM student_progress ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM lesson_schedules ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, lesson_time ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, availability_date, start_time, end_time FROM instructor_availability WHERE availability_date >= '2022-01-01' AND availability_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, lesson_id, progress_status FROM student_progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT instructor_name, availability_date, start_time, end_time FROM instructor_availability INNER JOIN lesson_schedules ON instructor_availability.instructor_id = lesson_schedules.instructor_id;

SELECT student_name, lesson_date, lesson_time, progress_status FROM student_progress INNER JOIN lesson_schedules ON student_progress.lesson_id = lesson_schedules.schedule_id ORDER BY lesson_date ASC, lesson_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM swimming_lessons;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM swimming_lessons WHERE lesson_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, instructor_id FROM swimming_lessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, progress_description FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM swimming_lessons;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM swimming_lessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM instructor_availability WHERE available_date >= '2022-01-01' AND available_time BETWEEN '08:00' AND '12:00';

SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email, COUNT(lesson_id) AS lesson_count FROM instructors JOIN swimming_lessons ON instructors.instructor_id = swimming_lessons.instructor_id GROUP BY instructor_name, instructor_email;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time, progress_description FROM swimming_lessons JOIN student_progress ON swimming_lessons.lesson_id = student_progress.lesson_id WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lesson_schedule;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM lesson_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM student WHERE student_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_specialty FROM instructor ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT progress_id, student_id, lesson_id, progress_rating FROM student_progress WHERE progress_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM lesson_schedule ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, lesson_time ASC, lesson_id DESC;
SELECT lesson_schedule.lesson_id, lesson_schedule.lesson_date, instructor.instructor_name FROM lesson_schedule JOIN instructor ON lesson_schedule.instructor_id = instructor.instructor_id;

SELECT student.student_name, lesson_schedule.lesson_date, lesson_schedule.lesson_time, student_progress.progress_rating FROM student JOIN lesson_schedule ON student.student_id = lesson_schedule.student_id JOIN student_progress ON student.student_id = student_progress.student_id;

SELECT lesson_schedule.lesson_location, instructor.instructor_name, student.student_name, student_progress.progress_notes FROM lesson_schedule JOIN instructor ON lesson_schedule.instructor_id = instructor.instructor_id JOIN student ON lesson_schedule.student_id = student.student_id JOIN student_progress ON student.student_id = student_progress.student_id WHERE lesson_schedule.lesson_location = 'Room A';

SELECT lesson_schedule.lesson_date, lesson_schedule.lesson_time, instructor.instructor_name, student.student_name FROM lesson_schedule JOIN instructor ON lesson_schedule.instructor_id = instructor.instructor_id JOIN student ON lesson_schedule.student_id = student.student_id WHERE student.student_level = 'Intermediate';
